headline: FTC bans GM from disclosing driver, consumer data to consumer reporting agencies
summary: U.S. automaker General Motors will be banned for five years from disclosing consumers' sensitive geolocation and driver behavior data to consumer reporting agencies, the Federal Trade Commission said...
